// Error: 搜索失效

23.9.26
目录url代码by:尐哖
发现代码by:Thomas喲

ruleContent.content:
<js>
i = result.match(/var c="([^"]*)"/)[1]
ii = java.base64Decode(i);
  //java.log(ii)
j=String(ii).replace(/^[^-]*-/,"-")
if(/=/.test(j)){jj=j.replace(/=[^=]*$/,"");}else{jj=j.replace(/_[^_]*$/,"");}
m=jj.replace(/-/g,"PHA+").replace(/_/g,"8L3A+");
n=java.getString("#chaptercontent@p@text");
n+	java.base64Decode(m)
</js>
ruleContent.replaceRegex: ##本章未完.*|小说推荐：.*|.*提示您：.*收藏.*|更多内容加载中.*|本站只支持手机浏览器.*|抖音推文【.*

ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
try{
next = java.getElement("@@.onclick")
	 uData = next.attr("onclick").match(/'(.*)'/)[1];
	 uData
}catch (e){}
</js>
